title: Bug 14162Need a perspective switcher
description: Bug 14162Need a perspective switcher Build 20020416With the menu changes, and the removal of the numbered perspective items, weneed another way of switching between perspectives.We should add a perspective switcher, similar to the editor and view switchers(Ctrl+F8?
EB: )It should show just the open ones in MRU order.Note: MRU order for perspective switching is supported by the usability studies.
